These are some past and future courses based on the **ped suite**.

## 2021

* Aug 18 and 25. **Statistical power in missing person cases**. Online lecture series for the *Proyecto de Cooperación Triangular Argentina-Colombia-Unión Europea*. [Lecture 1: Do we have enough data?](https://github.com/magnusdv/pedsuite/blob/master/vignettes/web_only/courses/colombia2021/Lecture1-power.pdf). [Lecture 2: Who should be exhumed?](https://github.com/magnusdv/pedsuite/blob/master/vignettes/web_only/courses/colombia2021/Lecture2-prioritisation.pdf).
* Jul 28-30. **Pedigree Analysis in R**. ISFG Summer School - Virtual Edition 2021. [Course homepage](https://magnusdv.github.io/pedsuite/articles/web_only/course-isfg2021.html).

## 2020

* Jan 06-10. **Statistical methods in relatedness and pedigree analysis**. NORBIS 1-week intensive course, Oslo, Norway. [Course homepage](https://familias.name/norbisRelatedness/).

## 2018
* Jan 08-12. **Statistical methods in relatedness and pedigree analysis**. NORBIS 1-week intensive course, Oslo, Norway. [Details and program](https://norbis.w.uib.no/activities/courses/statistical-methods-in-relatedness-and-pedigree-analysis/).

## 2016
* Nov 16-19. **Statistical methods in genetics using R**. 4-day intensive course, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. [Course homepage](https://familias.name/RioR/).
